LanguageData.JRWLycaenopsReconstruct.label: Lycaenops
LanguageData.JRWLycaenopsReconstruct.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #09344-1925 [LYCAENOPS ORNATUS] CODENAME: FENRIR >311
A carnivorous therapsid with a hide akin to a tiger and a wolf-like physique. They were capable of sudden bursts of speed, their terrible fangs able to strike down prey and their chance of escape. These creatures can often be seen lazing around near logs or rocks, hoarding the bounties of their hunt.
